page.title: 10A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: On a Sunday I usually get up at about 7 o'clock. I have buttered toast and bacon and egg for breakfast. I have some apple juice to drink. Then I play football in the garden. Then I go into my bedroom to play snooker. For dinner I usually have roast potatoes, pork, spring cabbage and Yorkshire pudding, and also have a drink of milk. Then I go and call on one of my friends. I usually ask them if they want to play cricket. For tea I would usually have some tomato soup. I have ice-cream and a drink of water. Then I go to the golf club to play golf with my Dad. For supper I have cornflakes and milk and sugar and a drink of milk. Then I watch the television and finally I go to bed at 9 o'clock.
